author: Bryan Clark
title: Coronavirus-related cyberattacks are booming with more than 2,600 new threats each day
description: As the world buckles under the weight of a pandemic, hackers, it seems, are coming out to play. Though cyberattacks, overall, have decreased somewhat during the quarantine and subsequent economic downturn, coronavirus-related malware is booming. Since mid-Feb…
content:
